data.eml:eml: A new species of Xenylla Tullberg, 1869 (Collembola: Hypogastruridae) from China, with a key to Asian species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jia, Junli, Skarżyński, Dariusz (2019): A new species of Xenylla Tullberg, 1869 (Collembola: Hypogastruridae) from China, with a key to Asian species of the genus. Zootaxa 4608 (3): 579-585, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4608.3.11
